reviews.review: Its worth buying this game and is especially so if you got someone to play co-op mode with.
É um jogo extremamente divertido com uma história boa e pode render muitas horas de jogo
Realmente muito bom, tanto para passar o tempo quanto para dar uma risada com amigos, mesmo sendo velho continua com graficos na minha opnião otimos.

All I'm saying is, if you have a significant other interested in video games, play this together and watch yourselves have an awesome relationship with lots of problem solving skills (needed in relationships btw), leading to a nice marriage and a pretty awesome kid.
this review isn't biased in any way related to apurture science.

Я ебал эти достижения
Fun game to play with friends, if you have any

PRÓS:
- Multiplayer simples e funcional.
- Idéias ingênuas e bem aplicadas.
- Roteiro bem escrito e humorado.

CONTRAS:
- Visual deixa a desejar.
- Trilho sonora nada impactante.
- Repetitivo para novos jogadores.

CONCLUSÃO:
E mais uma vez a Valve dá um show de criatividade, brincando com o jogador ao colocar o destino de um dos participantes na mão do outro. Uma das principais novidades de Portal 2 é a introdução de um modo multiplayer cooperativo. Acertos criam um sentimento de realização, enquanto os erros rendem momentos únicos de pura comicidade. É, sem dúvida, uma experiência a ter em conta.

Estupendo con cooperativo local, en red, worshop y 0,80€ en las rebajas de verano
Obligatorio en tu biblioteca!

ERMAGERRRD Never played this game and I got it because it was on sale. I am SO glad I bought the game. Not all that long, but the insults and puzzles that are the challenges more than made up for the game length. Definitely a great game!

This game exceeded every single expectation I had by a mile. The story was great, lots of good humor, puzzles fantastically designed, lots of variety and great pacing. The game made me feel like a genius and an idiot. Lots of thinking outside the box and a lot of satisfaction when solving a puzzle. I never played the first and I regret it now. An absolute masterpiece I think everyone should play, and that's only about the single player. I have yet to try co-op but so far a solid 10/10 would get a surprise from wheatley again.
Very fun game, totally not doing this for the stream grand prix thing.
